content:
I do not have personal favorites, but i can suggest some popular and well-received performances and shows you might enjoy. 

i would suggest checking out some of the following:

the phantom of the opera
hamilton
wicked
the lion king
les misérables
chicago
rent
west side story
dear evan hansen
the book of mormon

these are just a few examples of some of the most popular and successful shows in theater history. you can also explore different types of performances and shows like music, opera, ballet, or comedy, to see what you enjoy the most. online streaming platforms like broadwayhd and netflix also provide access to many recorded performances, which can provide a glimpse into the amazing talent and variety of the performing arts.
